headline: Does Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A) Still Offer Value After A 62% Three-Year Share Price Gain?
summary: If you are wondering whether Berkshire Hathaway's share price around US$756,943 reflects fair value or a premium, you are not alone. That is exactly what this article will unpack. Over the past week the stock returned 6.0%, with returns of 1.2% over 30 days, 1.7% year to date, 5.9% over 1 year, 62.4% over 3 years and 109.3% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about how much of this is already priced in. These price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing investor attention on...
